means.word_mean: 1. pretentious (especially with regard to language or ideals);

sentences.sentence: "high-flown talk of preserving the moral tone of the school"
"a high-sounding dissertation on the means to attain social revolution"

means.word_mean: 2. of high moral or intellectual value; elevated in nature or style;

sentences.sentence: "argue in terms of high-flown ideals"- Oliver Franks
